title: Daa2iso 0.1.4a + Uif2iso 0.1.4  (Open Source) - Convert daa and
description:
Here are two open source programs by the same author that convert daa and uif files to iso files. STOP USING PowerISO or MagicISO !

- Work on XP, Vista and Vista SP1. Should work on Mac and Linux too but I didn&#039;t try.
- No installation. Just click the .exe, choose your file and convert. Can&#039;t be more simple.
- Work like a charm, conversion is pretty fast.

For more information go to the author&#039;s site:. You can download the programs from there.
Here are some captures showing how simple it is:
-
-
-
-

I&#039;m spreading this because I want people to be aware that THEY DON&#039;T NEED to install PowerISO/MagicISO to deal with daa or uif files. Those formats suck, REFUSE them ! CONVERT them ! You don&#039;t even need to install anything. Click, convert, it can&#039;t be faster.

Please people download this torrent so that more people know about those programs.

Bye ! :)

PS: I&#039;m providing Daemon Tools Lite too, in case some people from Antartica don&#039;t know about it.
